name: Trouble In Space
description:
Starting with the basic info - You move with WASD , Slow motion is SHIFT and Dashing is with Q/E. Use W to activate your jetpack.

You are playing a blue robot who's been scammed to kill his own kind by a blue evil hologram named "Ding", You will have to kill every single one of your robot kind until you reach the end where you discover the cruel truth.

What are you going to see in the game ? You will have to defeat hundreds of enemies , using 3 main tools , your Slow motion effect , Your jetpack and dashing.
In each level have to kill every single enemy until they are all dead.

You will meet 5 different bosses , each has his own attacks and behaviour type and before each one of them you will meet Ding in a cut-scene , he will explain the situation and what about to happen and afterwards the boss fight will begin.

As you keep going through the game , the enemies will spawn in a bigger diversity and the levels will become harder , you are expected to also encouter mirrors in the advanced levels , which reflect all of the bullets coming at them, expect spiky balls coming at you at speed trying to kill you...

Also , in an advanced level you get Ding to be a helper , he will fly by your side and shoot his ammunation when you are firing to the opposite direction , it is very helpfull in the hard levels.

Without spoiling too much of the game you are about to play , lets just say that in the end you are expected to discover something you would not expect..
